text: 12:11 Jems 3:17-18Afeziam e akɨrmɨghasa osɨmtɨzim e ganɨngizɨ, e ghaze, osɨmtɨzir kam bar e itarazɨma e ikia bar akongezir puvatɨ. Egha en navir averiaba bar oseme. Eghtɨ an e akɨrigh gɨvaghtɨ, dagher aghuir en otivamibara kara: e Godɨn damazimɨn arazir aghuibara damuam, eghtɨ en navir averiaba amɨragh ikiam.
